name: Clerky
all_locations: Palo Alto, CA, USA; Burlingame, CA, USA; Remote
long_description: Clerky builds software to make legal paperwork easier for startups and their attorneys.  From formation to fundraising to hiring - everything a startup needs.  Thousands of top startups use Clerky to get legal paperwork done safely and efficiently.
one_liner: Makes legal paperwork easy for startups and their attorneys.

name: Draft
long_description:
Draft is a streamlined online word processor with version control.

Draft offers clean saves of drafts instead of the usual autosave jumble, clear version control between multiple users, easy importing from popular file services like Dropbox and Evernote, and something pretty unique â€” an editing service.

Built by one-man Y Combinator team Nathan Kontny (previously the cofounder of Inkling and Cityposh), the web app puts solo writing first. Its interface makes a point of looking nice, with the words you write appearing in large, plain-text font on a light-gray background.
one_liner: Making Draft. Super simple version control and collaboration forâ€¦

name: Crocodoc
long_description:
Crocodoc developed the world's most advanced web-based document viewing and collaboration technology for Microsoft Office and PDF files, built on open standards such as HTML5 and CSS3.

Whether viewing a document, adding comments to a presentation, highlighting an e-textbook, or filling out a form, we make it easy for companies to create amazing experiences for their users with technology that is secure, scalable, and trusted by top brands in the consumer and enterprise space.

Every month users upload millions of documents to Crocodoc, whose customers include top brands such as Dropbox, Yammer, LinkedIn, SAP, and Edmodo.

Crocodoc was founded in 2007 and is funded by Y Combinator, SV Angel, 500 Startups, and top angel investors including Joshua Schachter, Paul Buchheit, Steve Chen, and Shan Sinha.
one_liner: Embed PDFs, PowerPoints, and other documents into web and mobile apps

name: Zenter
long_description:
Zenter is an web based presentation app that promises to really take advantage of being online. Users will have the regular functionality of PowerPoint, but with the ability to directly add content from the web (Google Images). Each public slide show will also be put into a public library, for other users to remix or just drop into their show.

Zenter was acquired by Google in June, 2007.
one_liner: Zenter is the gmail of slides

name: Willing
long_description: Willing makes it easy for people to make wills without a lawyer. Answer simple questions and we'll instantly create all the legal documents you need to name guardians for your children and transfer your assets. We were acquired by MetLife and our technology now powers the world's largest legal insurance company.
one_liner: The best way to make your legal will.

name: GetAccept
long_description:
Close more deals by sending sales content with personalized video reminders, live chat and e-signature. Weâ€™re the Digital Sales Room platform for the best remote selling experience.

Today we are the fourth fastest growing SaaS company in the world and our platform is used in over 50 countries. From four founders, to over 200 employees worldwide in five years, and we still love every second of being a part of the journey. We have high hopes on whatâ€™s to come and could not be more excited for the future!
one_liner: Close deals faster. Digitally.

name: Bonsai
all_locations: Boulder, CO, USA; San Francisco, CA, USA; Remote
long_description:
Founded with the purpose of empowering anyone to work for themselves, Bonsai is the trusted back-office software solution for 500,000+ small businesses and self-employed around the world.

Bonsai helps individuals and teams manage their clients, deliver great work, get paid on time and track finances - all in the same place and integrated together to make running a business as seamless as possible.
one_liner: The all-in-one solution for small businesses and self-employed.

name: disclosures.io
long_description:
Every year $1.2 trillion in residential home sales are exchanged, however buying and selling a house is still a huge, painful process. Maybe thatâ€™s because Real Estate is the least digital industry, behind only agriculture ðŸ® . 

Disclosures.io is on a mission to make the real estate process more transparent and efficient for everyone involved. Our product helps sellers get their home to market faster and enables buyers to make more informed offers. 

We believe in lean, pragmatic product development, entrepreneurship and building a business that we are proud to be a part of. We love talking to like-minded makers, drop us a line!
one_liner: The Complete Listing Toolkit for the New Era of Real Estate
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate

name: Slite
all_locations: Berlin, Berlin, Germany; Remote, OR, USA; Remote
long_description:
Slite is an AI-powered knowledge base making it easy to create, manage, and access company information. 

Teams can quickly find what they need by simply asking questions. 
Slite makes it easy to keep your company's knowledge current. 

Over 1,500 companies and 50 000 users leverage Slite as their trusted source of knowledge.
one_liner: Team documentation removing the pain of maintaining and finding info

name: Lawyaw
long_description: Lawyaw is a vertical SaaS platform focused on enabling the digitization of legal services. Our platform solves a foundational gap in the market by making it easy to incorporate programmable documents into digital workflows. As a result we are transforming the $150B consumer legal services market by making access to legal services faster, cheaper and more convenient. We are currently power over 1,000 law firms and growing quickly, but have so much more to build!
one_liner: Automating document-based workflows

name: Handl
long_description: Handl converts documents (invoices, income stabs, custom forms, etc.)  into structured data through simple API. 100% automation implies no need for any supervision/manual work on your side and allows you to reduce costs, improve response time, and operate accurate data. Powered by the merge of ML/AI + humans-in-the-loop to work in real-time even for the most complicated cases
one_liner: Handl converts documents (invoices, income stabs, custom forms, etc.)â€¦

name: Seal
one_liner: All-in-one workspace for companies making regulated products

name: Curvenote
long_description: At Curvenote we are building the communication and publishing tools for scientists and engineers. In the future, every scientific report will feature interactive graphs with live data that will make it significantly easier to share and reproduce the work.
one_liner: Communication and publishing tools for scientists

name: FifthTry
long_description: FifthTry is a Notion-like documentation tool designed to end documentation rot. We integrate with GitHub and block code changes from getting deployed till documentation has been updated and approved. We call this Continuous Documentation.
one_liner: Continuous Documentation To End Documentation Rot

name: Roger
long_description: Sending and signing contracts should be easy. So why is it that existing eSignature tools are all so janky? The last thing you need is a frustrating eSignature tool. Thatâ€™s why weâ€™re building Roger â€” a faster, simpler eSignature. Think of it like what Linear did to Jira.
one_liner: The Best Way to Sign Contracts Since Handshakes. Roger that.

name: Pactima
long_description:
Pactima is a value-centric, fast-growing, and venture-backed company thatâ€™s transforming the manner in which businesses conduct transactions in our remote world.

Our flagship product, Live eSignatures<sup>TM</sup>, is a real-time solution that allows people to view and sign documents while simultaneously hosting a secured video call. This easy-to-use solution allows transactions that could only be done in-person to now be performed online.
one_liner: Live video signing for real-time agreements

name: Powerdocs
long_description: Powerdocs is an AI-powered proposals creation platform for businesses, agencies, and freelancers. We help you create professional documents like proposals, quotes, and user requirement documents effortlessly, saving you hours of manual work. With a passion for automation, weâ€™ve built the ultimate tool to simplify collaboration, streamline workflows, and let you focus on what truly mattersâ€”delivering exceptional results and winning clients.
one_liner: Create professional proposals, quotes, and documents in seconds.

name: Provision
long_description: Provision is building the contract analysis platform for construction. Instead of manually reading through thousands of pages of documents and revisions, Provision organizes and extracts information so constructors can save time and reduce the cost of future mistakes.
one_liner: Ironclad for construction

name: UpLink
all_locations: Palm Beach Gardens, FL, USA; Washington, DC, USA; Remote
long_description:
UpLink's founding team worked as auditors and software engineers at PwC where they saw firsthand how difficult it was to collect thousands of documents from clients.

Alex Maher and Alex Grant met working on PwCâ€™s big data analytics platform, scaling it from 0 to 20k users globally. Brady and Nick met while studying CS at a top 5 public university, but still insist they were self-taught. They were, by far, the top developers on Alex Maherâ€™s team before starting UpLink. Together they ran Dycom's field systems segment, supporting 15k users.
one_liner: Document Collection Software for Accountants, Auditors, and Lawyers

name: Landeed
long_description: Landeed is building India's (then for rest of the world)  fastest and most comprehensive property title search engine. More than 84% of Indian household wealth is stored in real estate, property and land. However, with 2/3rds of all court cases in India dealing with land-related disputes, it is essential that people have accessible public records to both protect themselves against litigation and provide appropriate documentation for facilitating transactions.
one_liner: Landeed is India's fastest property title search engine

name: Pyq AI
long_description: Pyq builds AI-powered workflow automation for commercial insurance brokerages. We help them automate 90% of their back-office operations, delivering 400% ROI within 4 weeks and the ability to grow revenue without adding (and even shrinking) headcount.
one_liner: AI automation for insurance brokerages

name: Extend
long_description: Weâ€™re helping companies transform their documents into high quality data, achieve unmatched accuracy, and ship custom document automation in days, not months.
one_liner: Document processing reimagined with LLMs

name: Automat
long_description:
Traditional automation software is slow and expensive, Automat is 10X faster and 1/10th the price. It lets operations teams automate using video and natural language.

ðŸ§ The problem: Traditional Robotic Process Automation is slow and expensive.
ðŸ’¡ Our Solution: Automat makes it 10X cheaper and faster to build any robotic process automation using natural language on any operating system

Weâ€™re solving this by creating a platform that enables robotics process automation for Chrome using large language models and computer vision.

Currently our customers send us descriptions or videos of the processes theyâ€™d like us to automate and we use our internal tooling to quickly build out those automations.
one_liner: AI enabled RPA using ChatGPT and computer vision

name: Docsum
long_description: Docsum is a contract intelligence platform designed for legal and finance teams. Using AI, Docsum extracts critical data like renewal dates, obligations, and more into a searchable database. The platform is fully customizable with features like custom field reporting, alerts, and playbook-powered redlining. Getting started is simpleâ€”upload contracts or connect Docsum to tools like Google Drive, DocuSign, and more.
one_liner: AI contract repository

name: Reducto
long_description: Reducto offers robust and reliable document ingestion for any workflow. Our API allows you to convert complex, unstructured documents into structured outputs that are perfect for RAG, process automation, and more.
one_liner: The most accurate API to parse documents

name: OmniAI
long_description:
Omni turns documents, slide decks, websites and more into the data you need. You'll never need to copy + paste data into spreadsheets again.
- Connect to a database or document store. We support Snowflake, Postgres, Google Drive, S3 and more.
- Transform your data - Define type safe schemas to run against your unstructured data. Weâ€™ll run those models against your data, and keep your warehouse in sync as new rows/fields are added/deleted.
- Query with SQL - All the transformed data stays in your warehouse. Surface this data in your product, or analyze with your existing BI tools.
one_liner: Automate document workflows

name: InQuery
long_description:
InQuery is a fully-automated medical record review platform that indexes, labels, and summarizes patient medical records so that physicians and attorneys can understand patient journeys at a glance. 

Our proprietary technology reasons about each record to surface key insights that could make or break your medical legal case.
one_liner: Intelligent Medical Record Reviews

name: Fileforge
long_description:
Fileforge is an API for PDF document workflows. 

With Fileforge, you can generate, manipulate, host, share, sign and track your documents - all in on place. Our open-source library helps developers build complex documents that integrate with our API and external services to build document-centric workflows.
one_liner: API For PDF Document Workflows

name: Midship
long_description: Midship is the fastest way to perform substantive tests during a financial audit. We accelerate procedures by automating repetitive document based tasks, with agents built just for audit.
one_liner: AI for Financial Audit Procedures

name: finbar
long_description: finbar is the AI investment analyst used by several top-20 (AUM) hedge funds. It automates financial modelling, research, and data analysis so multi-million-dollar decisions can be made 100x faster.
one_liner: The AI investment analyst

name: Magnetic
long_description:
Magnetic scans client documents - from handwritten charity notes to excel spreadsheet Schedule Cs to multi-state K-1s - and enters them into tax software automatically, saving hours of tedious data entry. 

The accounting profession is facing a massive talent shortage, as graduates choose different professions and the old guard begins to retire. As a result, CPA and tax preparation firms are awash in clientele, but unable to keep up. At many firms, phones go unanswered, clients are "fired", and websites are taken down, as the existing workforce tries to handle the grueling 80 hour+ weeks necessary to push through tax season to the April 15th deadline.

We built this because a former colleague who owns her own tax firm asked us to automate her workload, and we quickly realized the massive opportunity. Thomas brings deep domain expertise as the former Head of Product at Keeper (YC W19), where he built tax engine automation systems and an OCR form scanning system that outperformed everything else on the market. At Keeper, he leveraged early access to OpenAI's LLMs (well before ChatGPT) to build systems that automated the entire tax filing process, allowing a tiny team of CPAs to process thousands of returns with near zero busy work. Patrick was the first engineer at FunCraft, shipping multiple mobile games with 1M+ downloads and building scalable shared codebases. We've worked together since 2017, including co-leading multiple teams at Zynga as PM & Tech Lead respectively.

We launched this year in the middle of tax season and quickly processed hundreds of returns, earning thousands in ARR, and since tax season we've been growing customers by >30% month-over-month. We've completely automated over 25% of the return process so far and developed a proprietary vision model that beats incumbent scanning technology by almost 2x on accuracy - jumping from 50% field-level accuracy to 89%, approaching the quality of their expensive human-verified service at 92%.

The opportunity is massive - there are 80M US personal tax returns filed via professionals annually, in a $2B outsourcing market where individual CPA firms currently pay $100k-$1M per year for inferior services. We're positioned to capture significant market share by offering better accuracy & document coverage, instant processing, and superior user experience.

We've built this kind of software before, we've worked together for years (and even lived together), we've built products to $10M ARR before, and we have the grit to outwork anyone in this space.
one_liner: AI tax preparation for CPAs
